attributes.action: In view of the exhorbitant costs incurred, order the BBC to place online EVERY SINGLE WORD recorded in all investigations into the Savile debacle.
attributes.additional_details: The inquiries were paid for by taxpayers therefore the information recorded BELONGS TO THE TAXPAYER.  The BBC needs to be 100% transparent so every single word recorded anywhere on the planet as part of any and all investigations should be placed online, on the BBC website, by the BBC.  BBC Licence Tax Payers do not pay over their money (under threat of criminalisation) for it to be stolen and mis-used by criminals in the BBC hierarchy to protect themselves from prosecution.
